parameters.name: AutoRenew
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal for the premium bandwidth plan. Valid values:

*   **true**.
*   **false** (default).

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance that you want to renew.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description: The renewal period. By default, instances are renewed on a monthly basis. Valid values: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 12.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the renewal period. Valid values:

*   Month (default)
*   Year
